VISIBILITY_MANAGER.TITLE: Token Visibility Manager
VISIBILITY_MANAGER.NO_TOKENS: No tokens available in this scene

VISUAL_EFFECTS.HIDDEN_OVERLAY: This token is hidden from your view
VISUAL_EFFECTS.UNDETECTED_OVERLAY: This token is undetected by you
VISUAL_EFFECTS.CONCEALED_OVERLAY: This token is concealed from you

MECHANICAL_EFFECTS.HIDDEN_FLAT_CHECK: DC 11 flat check required for targeting
MECHANICAL_EFFECTS.CONCEALED_FLAT_CHECK: DC 5 flat check required for targeting
MECHANICAL_EFFECTS.UNDETECTED_CONDITION: Undetected condition applied with full mechanical effects
MECHANICAL_EFFECTS.HIDDEN_TOOLTIP: Hidden: You are off-guard to the target, and you must succeed at a DC 11 flat check when targeting it with an attack, spell, or other effect
MECHANICAL_EFFECTS.CONCEALED_TOOLTIP: Concealed: You must succeed at a DC 5 flat check when targeting with an attack, spell, or other effect
MECHANICAL_EFFECTS.UNDETECTED_TOOLTIP: Undetected: You don't know the target's location. You are off-guard to the target and you can't easily target it. Using the Seek action can help find an undetected creature
MECHANICAL_EFFECTS.BLINDED_OVERRIDE: All creatures appear Hidden due to Blinded condition
MECHANICAL_EFFECTS.DAZZLED_OVERRIDE: All creatures appear Concealed due to Dazzled condition

NOTIFICATIONS.NO_OBSERVER_SELECTED: Please select an observer token first
NOTIFICATIONS.MULTIPLE_OBSERVERS: Multiple observer tokens selected - please select only one

SEEK_AUTOMATION.BUTTON_TOOLTIP: Apply visibility changes based on Seek results
SEEK_AUTOMATION.NO_UNDETECTED_TOKENS: No hidden or undetected tokens found for {name}'s Seek action
SEEK_AUTOMATION.NO_CHANGES: No visibility changes needed for {name}'s Seek action
SEEK_AUTOMATION.ERROR_PROCESSING: Error applying Seek results. Check console for details.
SEEK_AUTOMATION.OPEN_RESULTS_TOOLTIP: Open the Seek results dialog to apply individual or bulk visibility changes
SEEK_AUTOMATION.SETTING_HINT: Automatically add buttons to Seek chat messages for applying visibility changes

ENABLE_HOVER_TOOLTIPS.name: Enable Hover Tooltips
ENABLE_HOVER_TOOLTIPS.hint: Show visibility status tooltips when hovering over tokens (requires restart)

SHOW_ONLY_ENCOUNTER_TOKENS.name: Show Only Encounter Tokens
SHOW_ONLY_ENCOUNTER_TOKENS.hint: When enabled, the visibility manager will only display tokens that are part of the current encounter

USE_HUD_BUTTON.name: Use Token HUD Button
USE_HUD_BUTTON.hint: When enabled, adds a visibility button to the token HUD. When disabled, uses a floating button when tokens are selected.

OFF_GUARD_METHOD.name: Off-Guard Automation Method
OFF_GUARD_METHOD.hint: Choose the method for applying off-guard conditions when attackers are hidden/undetected. Optimized (recommended) uses one consolidated effect per attacker with multiple rules. EphemeralEffect creates individual effects per target. Hybrid uses a combination of cloned actors and real conditions.

ENABLE_SEEK_AUTOMATION.name: Enable Seek Action Automation
ENABLE_SEEK_AUTOMATION.hint: When enabled, adds buttons to Seek action chat messages that automatically apply visibility changes based on the roll results vs target Stealth DCs.

OPEN_VISIBILITY_MANAGER.name: Open Token Visibility Manager
OPEN_VISIBILITY_MANAGER.hint: Open the visibility manager for selected tokens

TOGGLE_OBSERVER_MODE.name: Toggle Observer Mode for Hover Tooltips
TOGGLE_OBSERVER_MODE.hint: Hold this key to switch hover tooltips to observer mode (how hovered token sees others)
